(function avoidingXSSviaLocationHash() {
var location = window.location,
hash = location.hash,
xss = /[<>'"]/;
if (
xss.test( decodeURIComponent( hash ) ) ||
xss.test( hash )
) {
location.hash = '';
}
})();

<script>
(function sortbarDropdown() {
var sortbarContainer;
var sortbarOptionsContainer;
var sortbarOptions;
var sortByStarsButton;
var dropdownContainer;
var dropdownOptionsContainer;
var dropdownButton;
var movedOptions;
var dropdownIsNeeded;
function setup() {
sortbarContainer = document.getElementById('sort_by');
if (!!sortbarContainer) {
sortbarOptionsContainer = sortbarContainer.querySelector('ul');
sortbarOptions = [].slice.call(sortbarOptionsContainer.querySelectorAll('.sort_category'));
sortByStarsButton = sortbarOptionsContainer.querySelector('.sort_class > .sort_option');
dropdownContainer = document.getElementById('sortbar_dropdown_container');
dropdownOptionsContainer = document.getElementById('sortbar_dropdown_options');
dropdownButton = document.getElementById('sortbar_dropdown_button');
movedOptions = [];
dropdownIsNeeded = false;
prepare();
moveSelectedAndGeniusUp();
buildDropdown();
moveSelectedAndGeniusBeforeDropdown();
finalize();
}
}
function prepare() {
sortbarContainer.style.visibility = 'hidden';
dropdownContainer.style.display = 'none';
sortbarContainer.style.width = '680px';
}
function finalize() {
dropdownContainer.style.display = dropdownIsNeeded ? '' : 'none';
sortbarContainer.style.width = '';
sortbarContainer.style.visibility = 'visible';
if (dropdownIsNeeded) {
sortbarContainer.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
if (dropdownButton.contains(event.target)) {
dropdownOptionsContainer.classList.toggle('is-visible');
} else if (!dropdownOptionsContainer.contains(event.target)) {
dropdownOptionsContainer.classList.remove('is-visible');
} else if (sortByStarsButton && !sortByStarsButton.contains(event.target)) {
dropdownOptionsContainer.classList.remove('is-visible');
}
});
document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
if (!!sortbarContainer && !sortbarContainer.contains(event.target)) {
dropdownOptionsContainer.classList.remove('is-visible');
}
});
} else {
dropdownContainer.parentNode.removeChild(dropdownContainer);
}
}
function moveSelectedAndGeniusUp() {
for (var i = sortbarOptions.length; i--; ) {
if (!!sortbarOptions[i].offsetTop) {
if (
sortbarOptions[i].classList.contains('selected') ||
sortbarOptions[i].classList.contains('sort_genius')
) {
movedOptions.push(sortbarOptions[i]);
sortbarOptionsContainer.insertBefore(sortbarOptions[i], sortbarOptionsContainer.firstChild);
}
} else {
break;
}
}
if (!!movedOptions.length) {
for (var i = movedOptions.length; i--; ) {
sortbarOptions.sort(function(a, b) {
return a === movedOptions[i] ? -1 : b === movedOptions[i] ? 1 : 0;
});
}
}
}
function moveSelectedAndGeniusBeforeDropdown() {
if (!!movedOptions.length) {
for (var i = movedOptions.length; i--; ) {
sortbarOptionsContainer.insertBefore(movedOptions[i], dropdownContainer);
}
}
}
function buildDropdown() {
var dropdownOptions = [];
for (var i = sortbarOptions.length; i--; ) {
if (!!sortbarOptions[i].offsetTop) {
dropdownIsNeeded = true;
dropdownOptions.push(sortbarOptions[i]);
} else {
break;
}
}
if (dropdownIsNeeded) {
for (var i = dropdownOptions.length; i--; ) {
dropdownOptions[i].querySelector('a').setAttribute('role', 'menuitem');
dropdownOptionsContainer.appendChild(dropdownOptions[i]);
}
}
}
function ajaxSetup() {
function callback() {
if (!!B && !!B.require) {
var events = B.require('searchresults/events');
events.on(events.UI_BLOCK_UPDATED, function(e) {
if (e.id === 'sort_bar') {
setup();
}
});
}
}
if (document.attachEvent ? document.readyState === 'complete' : document.readyState !== 'loading') {
callback();
} else {
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', callback);
}
}
setup();
ajaxSetup();
}());
</script>

<div class="sr-hotel__title-wrap">
<h3 class="sr-hotel__title  
">
<a class="hotel_name_link url" href="
/hotel/vn/ibeach-centre.html?label=gen173nr-1FCAEoggI46AdIM1gEaPQBiAEBmAExuAEXyAEM2AEB6AEB-AECiAIBqAIDuALRz-T1BcACAQ&amp;sid=6eb6a0711aa53ab184909d8358fcf820&amp;age=12&amp;age=12&amp;age=12&amp;all_sr_blocks=514188110_217591140_6_2_0%2C514188110_217591140_1_1_0&amp;checkin=2020-05-17&amp;checkout=2020-06-05&amp;dest_id=-3723998&amp;dest_type=city&amp;from_beach_key_ufi_sr=1&amp;group_adults=3&amp;group_children=3&amp;hapos=1&amp;highlighted_blocks=514188110_217591140_6_2_0%2C514188110_217591140_1_1_0&amp;hpos=1&amp;no_rooms=2&amp;req_adults=3&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_children=3&amp;room1=A%2C12%2C12&amp;room2=A%2CA%2C12&amp;sr_order=popularity&amp;srepoch=1589192667&amp;srpvid=5376492d968900e6&amp;ucfs=1&amp;from=searchresults
;highlight_room=#hotelTmpl" target="_blank" rel="noopener">

iBeach Centre Hotel and Homestay

<span class="sr-hotel__title-badges">
<i class="

<div class="sr-hotel__title-wrap">
<h3 class="sr-hotel__title

<div class="sr-hotel__title-wrap">
<h3 class="sr-hotel__title  
">
<a class="hotel_name_link url" href="
/hotel/vn/dolphin-nha-trang-apartment.html?label=gen173nr-1FCAEoggI46AdIM1gEaPQBiAEBmAExuAEXyAEM2AEB6AEB-AECiAIBqAIDuALRz-T1BcACAQ&amp;sid=6eb6a0711aa53ab184909d8358fcf820&amp;age=12&amp;age=12&amp;age=12&amp;all_sr_blocks=385426114_131152988_6_2_0&amp;checkin=2020-05-17&amp;checkout=2020-06-05&amp;dest_id=-3723998&amp;dest_type=city&amp;from_beach_key_ufi_sr=1&amp;group_adults=3&amp;group_children=3&amp;hapos=8&amp;highlighted_blocks=385426114_131152988_6_2_0&amp;hpos=8&amp;no_rooms=2&amp;req_adults=3&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_age=12&amp;req_children=3&amp;room1=A%2C12%2C12&amp;room2=A%2CA%2C12&amp;sr_order=popularity&amp;srepoch=1589192667&amp;srpvid=5376492d968900e6&amp;ucfs=1&amp;from=searchresults
;highlight_room=#hotelTmpl" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
<div class="bui-u-inline" style="position: relative; bottom: 2px;">
<span class="bui-badge bh-property-type bh-property-type--constructive-dark" data-component="bh/exposure-counter" data-exposure-value="1" data-exposure-name="property_tag_sr">Apartments</span>
</div>
<span class="sr-hotel__name
" data-et-click="     customGoal:OQLOLOLOXaTFKGHCcZQHKKATXT:3     ">
Dolphin Nha Trang Apartment
</span>
<span class="invisible_spoken">Opens in new window</span>
</a>
</h3>
<span class="sr-hotel__title-badges">

<h4 class="sr-group-recommendation__title sr-group-recommendation__title_biggest">

</h4>
<div class="sr_gr sr-group_recommendation">

<h4 class="sr-group-recommendation__title sr-group-recommendation__title_biggest">

</h4>
<div class="sr_gr sr-group_recommendation">

<div class="sr-hotel__title-wrap">
<h3 class="sr-hotel__title

<div class="bui-alert__description" style="padding-left:0;">
<span class="bui-alert__title">Stay flexible</span>
<p class="bui-alert__text">In times of uncertainty, flexibility matters. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.</p>
<button aria-label="Read more" data-modal-id="c19-book-flex-modal" data-bui-component="Modal" class="bui-link bui-link--primary" type="button" data-et-click="EKdKYeUAKdeJOUJGNVZXJADUeQFaNfLae:2">
<span class="bui-button__text">
Read more
</span>
</button>
<template id="c19-book-flex-modal" style="display: none !important;">
<header class="bui-modal__header">
<h1 class="bui-modal__title" data-bui-ref="modal-title">Check your booking conditions</h1>
<p class="bui-modal__paragraph" data-bui-ref="modal-subtitle">For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.</p>

window.onLoadRecaptchaV3Callback = function() {
grecaptcha.ready(function() {
grecaptcha.execute('6LfzopcUAAAAAPh4ue2iRjzP6XdxDVpwJigtlmeD', {action: 'searchresults'}).then(function(token) {

});
});
});
};
</script>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;" tabindex="-1">
<span class="invisible_spoken">Start of dialog content</span>
<div class="intro_header">
<h2 class="bui-modal__title">Verified reviews from real guests.</h2>
<p class="bui-modal__paragraph">We have more than 70 million property reviews, all from <strong>real, verified guests</strong>.</p>
</div>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h2 class="rlp-intro__title rlp-intro__a11y-exp-title">How does it work?</h2>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how a11y_contrast_blue_gray">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull" aria-hidden="true"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h3 class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__a11y-exp-title">It starts with a booking</h3>
<span class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__caption">It starts with a booking</span>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl" aria-hidden="true">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip" aria-hidden="true"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h3 class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__a11y-exp-title">Followed by a trip</h3>
<span class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__caption">Followed by a trip</span>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl" aria-hidden="true">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback" aria-hidden="true"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h3 class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__a11y-exp-title">And finally, a review</h3>
<span class="rlp-intro-how__title rlp-intro-how__caption">And finally, a review</span>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>

function blocktoggle(sToggle) {
var sToggleId = '#blocktoggle' + sToggle;
$(sToggleId).toggle();
}
function blockdisplay(i) {
var body = $( document.body );
if (document.getElementById("blockdisplay" + i)) {
for (var j = 1; j <= 4; j++) {
if (document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j)) {
document.getElementById('blockdisplay' + j).style.display = (j === i) ? 'block' : 'none';
}
}
body.trigger((i == 4) ? 'ReviewsTab_onOpen' : 'ReviewsTab_onClose')
.trigger( 'RT:reset' );
( booking.eventEmitter || $( window ) )
.trigger( 'BLOCKDISPLAY' + i + '.OPEN' );
if (i === 1 && typeof bMovableBookNowButton != "undefined") {
bMovableBookNowButton.init();
}
if (i == 4) {
$(".toggle_overview").show();
$(".toggle_review").hide();
} else {
$(".toggle_review").show();
$(".toggle_overview").hide();
}
}
}
function popup( url, w, h ) {
newWindow = window.open( url, 'popupWindow', 'width=' + w + ',height=' + h + ',menubar=no,toolbar=no,location=no,bookmarks=no,status=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=yes' );
if ( window.focus ) {
newWindow.focus();
}
}
